text: Léonard Thurre (born 9 September 1977) is a Swiss former international footballer. ==Career== After 8 caps with no goals, Thurre was recalled to the Swiss international set-up in 2004, being included in the 26-man provisional squad for the UEFA Euro 2004, however he did not make the final squad. After retiring, Thurre took up a position as sports director of former club Lausanne-Sport, a position he held for a year until he mutually agreed to leave the club. It was reported that he wanted more responsibilities, which the club was unwilling to offer. ==Personal life== Thurre has a son, Maxence, who was born on 27 May 2012. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! title: Léonard Thurre
